General.Name: Bank Multiarta Sentosa PT
General.Description: PT Bank Multiarta Sentosa Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, provides various banking products and services in Indonesia. It offers current, savings, foreign currency, and time deposits; and working capital, investment, and consumer loans. The company also provides remittance, export and import, clearance, fund transfer, payroll, and bill payment services; safe deposit boxes; internet and mobile banking; and automated teller machine cards. It operates a network of branches and sub-branches. PT Bank Multiarta Sentosa Tbk was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.
